channel.title: Sever Help!
channel.description:
" The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . . " ive tried everything ive seen on youtube about the jdk , I mean atleast I get the server to run , but when I turn on the client it says " connection error " , how can I fix all this , oh & where can I put the chache I saw something about pustting it some where in the client or idk what , please help ???
[URL=http://s42.photobucket.com/user/deochoa1996/media/Capture_zps8a0e2760.png.html][IMG]http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e338/deochoa1996/Capture_zps8a0e2760.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Sever Help!
item.dc:creator: @anthonyarggg anthonyarggg
item.description:
@anthonyarggg wrote:

Place your cache in your “C:/”

Read full topic

item.title: Sever Help!
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You need to make sure it can find the file it is looking for. The console window clearly tells you what’s wrong.

Read full topic
